verse: उत्सर्जने तु रा शब्दो धारणे पोषणे च धा। (सनत्कुमारीय योगरहस्योपनिषत् ७-४-८)

terms.उत्सर्जने: in the process of withdrawing or letting go
terms.धारणे: in the process of holding or sustaining
terms.पोषणे: in the process of nourishing or supporting

meaning: Meaning: In the process of withdrawing or letting go, the syllable 'ra' represents the sound or word, while in the process of holding or sustaining, the syllable 'dha' represents the sound or word.
